casebody.data:
Debra MARBLY, Plaintiff-Appellee,
and
American Anesthesia Associates, LLC, and Spine Specialists Of Michigan, PC, Intervening Plaintiffs-Appellees,
and
Selective Care Case Management, LLC, and Michigan Pain Management, LLC, Intervening Plaintiffs,
v.
Brandi ROBERTSON, Defendant,
and
American Country Insurance Company, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157455
COA: 333286 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the January 16, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
